title: Anthony Mackie
description:
Anthony Mackie (Avengers: Endgame, The Falcon and the Winter Soldier) talks to Justin about what it was like growing up in New Orleans, his love of Broadway and live theater, and the career advice that Morgan Freeman once gave him.
